title: "Machine Menace Wallpaper"
content: Welcome to our website, where we offer a collection of dark and ominous wallpapers featuring abstract illustrations of menacing machines. Our carefully curated selection includes high-quality images with intricate details, such as glowing red lights and mechanical parts, that are sure to add a touch of edge to your desktop or mobile device. Whether you're a fan of science fiction, cyberpunk, or just appreciate the aesthetic of dystopian futures, our collection has something for everyone. Browse through our gallery and find the perfect wallpaper to match your style and personality. With our easy download process, you can have your new wallpaper set up in no time. Join us and embrace the darkness!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring an abstract illustration of a dark and ominous machine, with glowing red lights and mechanical parts."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
